message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product. I'm excited to start our negotiation. After careful consideration, I'm willing to offer you the product for $1200000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to your business.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1000000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the market value of the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1000000. I'm willing to compromise and offer you the product for $1100000. I believe this price still reflects the value the product will bring to your business, while also being a reasonable compromise.
